        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head></head><body><p></p>
<style type="text/css">
	* {
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
	}

	body {
		margin: 0 auto !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
		font-family: Lato, Arial, sans-serif;
	}

	.btn a {
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.btn.inverse a {
		color: #fff;
	}

	#requestapprove a {
		color: #fff !important;
	}

	span.footer,
	#templateAddress,
	#templateCopyright,
	#templateCopyright *,
	#templateAddress * {
		margin: 0;
		font-size: 14px;
		line-height: 18px;
		color: #ffffff;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe,
	#snc_notification_preference {
		color: #3C59E7;
		font-size: 10px;
		line-height: 15px;
	}

	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		padding-right: 5px;
	}

	#snc_notification_preference {
		padding-left: 5px;
	}

	body,
	table,
	td,
	p,
	a {
		-ms-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
		-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100% !important;
	}

	table,
	tr,
	td {
		border-spacing: 0 !important;
		mso-table-lspace: 0 !important;
		mso-table-rspace: 0 !important;
		border-collapse: collapse !important;
		mso-line-height-rule: exactly !important;
	}

	.ExternalClass * {
		line-height: 100%;
	}

	.mobile-link a,
	.mobile-link span {
		text-decoration: none !important;
		color: inherit !important;
		border: none !important;
	}
</style>
<div style="margin: 0 auto !important;" align="center">
<table class="w100" style="width: 600px; background-color: #fef6e6; margin: 0 auto !important; padding: 0px;" border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" bgcolor="#FEF6E6">
<tbody>
<tr style="height: 150px;">

<table border="0" width="600" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-spacing: 0px; width: 100.2%; height: 250px;">

<tbody><!-- Main Container -->
<tr style="height: 20.4px;">
<td class="pad-sides-20" style="border-radius: 6px; text-align: left; background: #ffffff; padding: 24px; height: 20.4px;" align="center"><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi Ashik Vinod,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Sreerag  Anchery has submitted the project effort<br><br><b>Project name : </b>Blessing ITSM Project<br><br><b>Project Work : </b>testt<br></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #d4fad9;border: 1px solid #d4fad9;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Re%3APE0001065%20-%20approve&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0001725_DtlknaylVAppvgqYpFlu" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Approve</a></td></tr></tbody></table><p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #fad4d4;border: 1px solid #fad4d4;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Re%3APE0001065%20-%20reject&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0001725_DtlknaylVAppvgqYpFlu" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Reject</a></td></tr></tbody></table><p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><a href="/sysapproval_approver.do?sys_id=fc13123e8325aa10a946f896feaad33f&amp;sysparm_record_target=sysapproval_approver">click here to view approval record.</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><a href="/u_project_effort.do?sys_id=e1039afa8325aa10a946f896feaad3ec&amp;sysparm_record_target=u_project_effort">click here to view Project efforts record.</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Regards,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Zynder Tech.</span></p></td>
</tr>
